fields.summary: CLI: node_modules in project root should be handled properly

fields.description:
Dependencies that use ES6+ are currently not handled properly in Titanium.

To reproduce:
1. Create a new Ti app
2. Run {{npm init}} in app/lib
3. Run {{npm i redux --save}} (in app/lib as well)
4. Add {{import \{ createStore \} from 'redux'}} to your app.js / index.js (ES6 enabled)
5. Run your app
fields.summary: CLI: ES6+ dependencies in app/lib/node_modules not handled properly
